original_title: エコエコアザラクII -BIRTH OF THE WIZARD-
overview: In Meiji-era Japan, a village of witches and wizards is slaughtered. Years later, an archaeologist discovers a mummy from the village, which reanimates, murders, then possesses his assistant. This evil spirit is now searching for Misa, who is protected by a survivor of the original massacre, known only as Saiga.
title: Eko Eko Azarak II: Birth of the Wizard
